snippet: Thirty-seven people had died as of Friday afternoon in a Mumbai suburb, and at least 25 others were hospitalized.
abstract: Mumbai police say that 37 people have died after consuming toxic, illegally-produced liquor and that at least 25 have been hospitalized.
lead_paragraph: Thirty-seven people had died as of Friday afternoon in a Mumbai suburb, and at least 25 others were hospitalized.

headline.main: Dozens Die in India After Drinking Tainted Liquor
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; India: Toxic Liquor Kills Dozens
